column4: This channel is here as a community resource, correct? WTF is with your attitudes? If your not going to help STFU!
Thank you. Now is there something I can do? Surely one of you has an ipod and you manage it from Ubuntu.
besides telling him to buy a mac.
that used to work. until I "ejected" the device. Now it doesn't show up as an attached device...
not even on an XP machine with itunes installed
i already "reset settings" on the ipod
as I explained earlier, there is noting in /dev/ for that device.
if the iPod won't connect in windows nor ubuntu, it;s a ipod issue, reset with cd should cure it.
yes, devhell i was talking to you
i can't mount it because there is no /dev/sd*
what do you mean "reset with cd"? i don't have the cd. Is this something that I can download
